parameters.query: =SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(numero_proforma, 9) AS INTEGER)), 0) + 1 as next_num FROM proformas WHERE numero_proforma LIKE 'PRO-' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY') || '-%'

=INSERT INTO proformas (tenant_id, client_final_id, numero_proforma, date_proforma, date_validite, montant_ht, montant_ttc, tva_taux, description, mode_paiement, statut, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ('{{ $json.tenantId }}', '{{ $json.clientFinalId }}', '{{ $json.numeroProforma }}', '{{ $json.dateProforma }}', '{{ $json.dateValidite }}', {{ $json.montantHt }}, {{ $json.montantTtc }}, {{ $json.tvaTaux }}, '{{ $json.description }}', '{{ $json.modePaiement }}', 'brouillon', NOW(), NOW()) RETURNING id
